dashboard.readyToContinue: Ready to continue your growth journey?

day0.quote: Knowledge is the foundation of progress. Without education, a nation cannot rise.
day0.author: Abdulla Qodiriy

day1.quote: The pen is mightier than the sword. Through writing, we can change minds and hearts.
day1.author: Cholpon

day2.quote: Unity and brotherhood are the pillars of our strength. Together, we can achieve greatness.
day2.author: Fitrat

day3.quote: Respect for tradition and embrace of progress are not contradictoryâ€”they are complementary.
day3.author: Mahmud Khoja Behbudi

day4.quote: The future belongs to those who invest in education and cultivate wisdom in the young.
day4.author: Mirza Abdulqadir Bedil

day5.quote: Justice and fairness are the cornerstones of a prosperous society.
day5.author: Ali Shir Nava'i

day6.quote: Perseverance in the face of adversity is the mark of true character and strength.
day6.author: Navoi

onboarding.slide1_description: In the age of modern technologies and the internet, it is important to preserve and develop our spiritual values.
onboarding.slide2_description: Preserving the rich spiritual heritage and values of the Uzbek people in digital format and passing them on to future generations.
onboarding.slide3_description: Formation and development of the spiritual education of our youth through modern methods.

diagnostic_test.strength_point: Your current strengths across key life areas
diagnostic_test.potential_point: Areas with the most potential for growth
diagnostic_test.resources_point: Curated resources for your development journey
diagnostic_test.processing_description: Our AI is analyzing your responses and generating personalized recommendations...
diagnostic_test.toast_auth_required_description: Please sign in to save your results
diagnostic_test.toast_processing_failed_description: Something went wrong. Please try again.

diagnostic_data.test_description: A comprehensive evaluation of your current state across key life areas to provide personalized growth recommendations.
diagnostic_data.question_eq1: I am aware of my emotions as they occur
diagnostic_data.question_eq2: I can manage my emotions effectively during stressful situations
diagnostic_data.question_eq3: I understand how my emotions affect others
diagnostic_data.question_eq4: I can bounce back quickly from setbacks
diagnostic_data.question_social1: I feel comfortable in social situations
diagnostic_data.question_social2: I can effectively communicate my ideas to others
diagnostic_data.question_social3: I actively listen when others are speaking
diagnostic_data.question_career1: I have clear goals for my career development
diagnostic_data.question_career2: I actively seek opportunities to learn new skills
diagnostic_data.question_career3: I feel satisfied with my current work-life balance
diagnostic_data.question_career4: I take initiative in my professional responsibilities
diagnostic_data.question_health1: I maintain a regular exercise routine
diagnostic_data.question_health2: I get adequate sleep most nights
diagnostic_data.question_health3: I eat a balanced and nutritious diet
diagnostic_data.question_health4: I effectively manage stress in my daily life
diagnostic_data.question_mindful1: I practice mindfulness or meditation regularly
diagnostic_data.question_mindful2: I am present and focused during daily activities
diagnostic_data.question_mindful3: I regularly reflect on my personal growth
diagnostic_data.question_mindful4: I am aware of my personal values and live by them
diagnostic_data.question_rel1: I maintain meaningful relationships with family and friends
diagnostic_data.question_rel2: I can express my needs and boundaries clearly
diagnostic_data.question_rel3: I show empathy and understanding toward others
diagnostic_data.question_rel4: I invest time and energy in building relationships
diagnostic_data.rec_emotional_description: Your emotional awareness and regulation could benefit from focused development. Building these skills will improve your overall well-being and relationships.
diagnostic_data.rec_emotional_action1: Practice daily emotion journaling for 5 minutes
diagnostic_data.rec_emotional_action2: Try the 'STOP' technique when feeling overwhelmed
diagnostic_data.rec_emotional_impact: Significant improvement in stress management and relationships within 4-6 weeks
diagnostic_data.rec_social_description: Improving your social skills will help you build stronger relationships and feel more confident in social situations.
diagnostic_data.rec_social_action2: Join a social group or club aligned with your interests
diagnostic_data.rec_social_action3: Set a goal to have one meaningful conversation daily
diagnostic_data.rec_social_impact: Noticeable improvement in social confidence within 3-4 weeks
diagnostic_data.rec_social_resource1_title: How to Win Friends and Influence People
diagnostic_data.rec_health_description: Your physical health foundation needs attention. Small, consistent changes can lead to significant improvements in energy and well-being.
diagnostic_data.rec_health_action1: Start with 10 minutes of daily movement
diagnostic_data.rec_health_action3: Plan and prep healthy meals weekly
diagnostic_data.rec_health_impact: Increased energy and better mood within 2-3 weeks
diagnostic_data.rec_career_description: You have a solid foundation but can benefit from more strategic career planning and skill development.
diagnostic_data.rec_career_action1: Set specific, measurable career goals for the next year
diagnostic_data.rec_career_action3: Seek feedback from mentors or supervisors
diagnostic_data.rec_career_action4: Network with professionals in your field
diagnostic_data.rec_career_impact: Clear career direction and new opportunities within 2-3 months
diagnostic_data.rec_mindfulness_description: You show good self-awareness but could benefit from more consistent mindfulness practices.
diagnostic_data.rec_mindfulness_action2: Practice mindful eating during one meal per day
diagnostic_data.rec_mindfulness_action3: Use mindfulness apps for guided sessions
diagnostic_data.rec_mindfulness_impact: Enhanced focus and emotional balance within 3-4 weeks
diagnostic_data.rec_general_description: You're doing well across most areas! Focus on maintaining your current practices while exploring new growth opportunities.
diagnostic_data.rec_general_action1: Set new challenging but achievable goals
diagnostic_data.rec_general_action2: Explore areas outside your comfort zone
diagnostic_data.rec_general_action3: Share your knowledge and mentor others
diagnostic_data.rec_general_resource1_title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
